articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kim Jong Un to unveil new strategic weapon: KCNA
articles.description: North Korean state media KCNA said that leader Kim Jong Un is planning to reveal a new strategic weapon in the new year, following stalled talks with Washington over concessions in denuclearisation talks. Jayson Albano reports.
articles.content:
Posted 
North Korean state media KCNA said that leader Kim Jong Un is planning to reveal a new strategic weapon in the new year, following stalled talks with Washington over concessions in denuclearisation talks. Jayson Albano reports.
